message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.MM. 

The paper proposes a method for detecting concept words in videos to improve performance in video-to-language tasks such as captioning, retrieval, and question answering. This involves using a semantic attention mechanism and training the word detector in an end-to-end manner with the language model. Given the focus on video analysis and language generation, the most likely sub-category is computer vision (cs.CV). However, the paper also involves natural language processing (cs.CL) and machine learning (cs.LG) techniques. Information retrieval (cs.IR) is relevant for the retrieval task, and multimedia (cs.MM) is relevant for the use of videos as input.
